Package gremlins

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    App
    App class responsible for running the game.
    Brickwall
    Brickwall class, preventing entities from travelling through and can be destroyed
    Creature
    Creature class extended from GameObject class and implemented the Moving interface, a superclass for wizard and gremlin objects.
    Exit
    Class Exit designating the exit destination on the map
    Fireball
    Fireball class extending Projectile class.
    FreeTile
    FreeTile class, denoting any non significant tiles and has a pair of coordinates
    GameObject
    GameObject class, the parent class for all objects in the game.
    Gremlin
    Class Gremlin extending Creature class, gremlins changes direction when colliding with walls and shoot slimes on an interval.
    Portal
    Portal class extending GameObject, wizard teleports to another random portal when collided
    Projectile
    Projectile class extending Game Object and implementing the Destructible and Moving interfaces.
    Slime
    Slime class extending Projectile class, moves at a constant velocity and disappear upon collision.
    Snowball
    Snowball class extending GameObject and implementing Destructible.
    Stonewall
    Stonewall class extending GameObject.
    Wizard
    Wizard class extending Creature.
